[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [RushConfigurationProject](./rush-lib.rushconfigurationproject.md) &gt; [configuredSubspaceName](./rush-lib.rushconfigurationproject.configuredsubspacename.md)

## RushConfigurationProject.configuredSubspaceName property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Returns the subspace name specified in the `"subspaceName"` field in `rush.json`<></>. Note that this field may be undefined, if the `default` subspace is being used, and this field may be ignored if the subspaces feature is disabled.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly configuredSubspaceName: string | undefined;
```
